cookie_description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can customize your preferences below.
essential_desc: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.
analytics_desc: Help us understand how you use our app to improve it.
marketing_desc: Used to show you relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.
age_verification_desc: You must be at least {{age}} years old to use this application.
age_requirement: You must be at least {{age}} years old to access this content.
coppa_notice: We comply with COPPA regulations to protect children's privacy online.
breach_support: If you have concerns, please contact our support team.
health_disclaimer_1: This app provides general fitness information and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
health_disclaimer_2: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before starting any exercise program or making changes to your diet.
health_disclaimer_3: If you experience pain, dizziness, or discomfort during exercise, stop immediately and seek medical attention.
disclaimer_checkbox: I understand that this app does not provide medical advice and I will consult a healthcare professional before making health-related decisions.
consult_professional: For medical emergencies, contact emergency services immediately.
